title: Review Schedule
description: Tracks periodic review of worldbuilding materials for consistency, completeness, and quality. Ensures the world is revisited and refined on a regular schedule.

review_checklist.description: Items to check during each review

changes_to_make_file.description: Path or reference to a running list of changes identified during reviews

areas_of_concern.description: Known weak spots or areas that need extra attention

starting_element.description: The element you started with (e.g., a forest, species, organization)

looping_exercises.description: Looping exercises: pick an element, describe its relationships, then loop into related files and update them, then loop back (source: V3 Ch11 lines 7826-7832)

hedging_used.description: How flexibility was built in ('usually', 'people believed', character stated it)

hedging_language_log.description: Track rules stated as absolutes vs. hedged rules -- helps avoid inconsistency while maintaining flexibility (source: V3 Ch11 lines 7817-7821)

x-cross-references.world-building-strategy: Review aligns with overall worldbuilding strategy
